other_tests.findings: Aortic root dilation at the aortic sinus of 13 mm (Z score +3) without aortic insufficiency. Patent foramen ovale and ductus arteriosus with a hemodynamically not significant left-to-right shunt.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiography at 5 months showed aortic dilation progressing to 18 mm. Evaluation at 7 months showed aortic dilation stabilizing at 20 mm. The latest evaluation at 13 months showed dilation progressing to 24.5 mm.

other_tests.findings: Found a novel, heterozygote, missense, de novo variant (c.1378C>G, p.(Arg460Gly)) in the TGFBR2 (NM_003242.5) gene.
